GH_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Personal Access Token of the Homu bot.
GH_ACCESS_TOKEN.value: ignore you will fill this later

GH_OAUTH_ID.description: Oauth ID of the Homu application.
GH_OAUTH_ID.value: ignore you will fill this later

GH_OAUTH_SECRET.description: Oauth Secret of the Homu application.
GH_OAUTH_SECRET.value: ignore you will fill this later

GH_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Some "secret" that the Homu webhook will use.

GIT_SSH_KEY.description: A private SSH key associated with you GitHub account. Setting this value lets Homu use git locally, which speeds up Travis by reducing temporary commits.

TRAVIS_TOKEN.value: ignore you will fill this later

HOMU_APPVEYOR_REPOS.description: Space separated list of GitHub repositories, in $OWNER/$REPO format, that Homu watches over and must always pass AppVeyor CI. Example value: "rust-lang/rust rust-lang/libc" but without the double quotes.

HOMU_TRAVIS_REPOS.description: Pretty much the same as HOMU_APPVEYOR_REPOS. But these repositories must always pass Travis CI

HOMU_REVIEWERS.description: Space separated list of GitHub users that have "r+" rights. Example value: "larry moe curly" but without the double quotes.
